DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . This trial aim evaluate safety efficacy 17-beta Estradiol treatment atrophic vaginitis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy 17-Beta Estradiol Treatment Atrophic Vaginitis : An Extension Trial
